front.title: IEEE Draft Standard for Local and Metropolitan Area Networks--Bridges and Bridged Networks Amendment: YANG Data Model for Connectivity Fault Management

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.keyword: Virtual Bridged Local Area Networks (virtual LANs)
front.abstract: This amendment to IEEE Std 802.1Q-2018 as amended by IEEE 802.1Qcp-2018 provides a YANG data model in support of configuration and operational status information for a subset of Bridging capabilities.
